titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-460, by Mr. Putnam.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 175.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1096, H. Res. 810 is laid on the table.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendars and Committee Reports) to allow consideration of H.Con.Res. 376 (the congressional budget resolution for FY2007) on the same day it is presented to the House.
